thread.title: Champions Return to Tiburón at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Resort, NaplesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Champions Return to Tiburón at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Resort, NaplesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Champions Return to Tiburón at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Resort, NaplesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Champions Return to Tiburón at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Resort, Naples Published on : Thursday, August 27, 2015
The LPGA’s CME Group Tour Championship and the PGA’s TOUR’s Franklin Templeton Shootout, two of golf most exciting events, return to Tiburón Golf Club at The Ritz-Carlton Golf Resort, Naples and promise fans close calls and dramatic finishes.
The CME Group Tour Championship, featuring 72 of the best female golfers from around the globe, will be played November 19 – 22. The event, which is the grand finale of the 2015 LPGA Tour season, will see the champion take home $500,000 while the player who accumulates the most points in the season-long CME Race to the Globe, will win $1,000,000, the largest payout on the LPGA Tour. Last year, Lydia Ko tapped in for par on the fourth sudden-death playoff hole to net the biggest payday in women’s golf history, winning both the Race to the CME Globe and the CME Group Tour Championship for a $1.5 million windfall.
Additionally, December 10 – 12, the Franklin Templeton Shootout, hosted by World Golf Hall of Fame member, Greg Norman, will once again welcome 24 of the world’s best golfers to Naples. Competing for a $3.1 million purse, golf’s top professionals including defending champions Cameron Tringle and Jason Day – 2015 PGA Championship winner – will play on two-man teams in a mixed format of scramble, modified-alternate shot and better ball. Naples only PGA TOUR event will once again be televised to an international audience on Golf Channel and FOX and will benefit a variety of worthy charities including CureSearch for Children’s Cancer.
All registered guests of the beach and golf resorts will receive complimentary grounds access to both the CME Group Tour Championship and Franklin Templeton Shootout events.
Source:- Ritz-Carlton
